channel.title: Creating objects in pimpsource
channel.description:
Im sorry if this is in the wrong forum or anything, or if there is a tutorial on creating/spawning objects, but i havnt found any so i thought i would ask here.
How do you spawn/create objects in pimpscape? if its possible :confused:

item.title: Creating objects in pimpsource
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

no. to delte objects that already exist, put an object with the ID of 6591 on the coards of the object you want to delete.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating objects in pimpsource
item.dc:creator: @mr_pns mr pns
item.description:
@mr_pns wrote:

Thanks, and if i want to delete objects do i just delete that, or what about deleting objects that are already there? like a table or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating objects in pimpsource
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

in client.java. serch
public void AddGlobalObj(

the last } in the void, add this

public void NewObjects() {}

then serch for case 121.

add
public void NewObjects() in it.

fallow this format for adding objects.
between the {}

in
public void NewObjects() {}
add
AddGlobalObj(X , Y, ID, FACE, 10);

Read full topic
